saveChoices module¶

This module reads and writes CSV files to save/load the training data.

Project : Bomberman Bot with Machine Learning Olin College Software Design Final Orject, Spring 2017 By : TEAM AFK

saveChoices.addRow(fileName, listInfo)[source]¶

Adds a new row to the csv.

saveChoices.readCSV(fileName)[source]¶

Loads the CSV file with the given filename

saveChoices.rewrite(fileName)[source]¶

Overwrites the CSV file with the given filename

saveChoices.writeHead(fileName)[source]¶

Inserts the header into csv file.
